mapper.select: select * from (select movieName "name", rank() over (order by cnt desc) as movieRank from (select F.NAME as movieName, count(*) as cnt from TICKET_RECEIPTS A, TICKETS B, MOVIE_TIMETABLE C, SCREEN_MOVIES D, MOVIES E, MOVIE_TRANSLATION F where A.id = B.TICKET_RECEIPT_ID and B.MOVIE_TIMETABLE_ID = C.ID and C.SCREEN_MOVIE_ID = D.ID and D.MOVIE_ID = E.ID and E.ID = F.MOVIE_ID and A.PURCHASE_DATE >= #{startDate} and A.PURCHASE_DATE <= #{endDate} group by F.NAME)) where movieRank <= 5
